dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 136 IH: Flood Protection Public Safety Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Matsui introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To authorize certain civil works projects, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Flood Protection Public Safety Act of 2013.

section.header: Authorization of certain flood risk management projects
section.text: The Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, is authorized to implement any flood risk management project for which, before the date of enactment of this Act, the Secretary of the Army has transmitted to Congress a letter that includesâ€”

paragraph.text: a description of the project as recommended in a report by the Chief of Engineers that concludes that the project is technically sound, environmentally acceptable, and economically justified; and
notification that the Office of Management and Budget has concluded that the recommendations in the report are consistent with the policy and programs of the President.
